DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine impact absorbable urethrovesical sling post-operative return urinary continence robot-assisted radical prostatectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Return Continence Following Robot-Assisted Radical Prostatectomy With Without Urethrovesical Sling
DOC.criteria: Patients must organ confined prostate cancer . Patients must PSA < 15 . Patients must clinical stage prostate cancer < cT3 . Patients must schedule robot assist transperitoneal laparoscopic radical prostatectomy . Patients must able provide write informed consent HIPAA authorization release personal health information . Patients must least 18 year age . Patients must previously undergo transurethral resection , laser therapy , microwave therapy , radiofrequency ablation , surgery prostate . Patients must previously undergo incision urethral stricture incision bladder neck contracture . Patients must previously diagnose urethral stricture , bladder neck contracture urinary incontinence . Patients must previously diagnose atonic bladder neurogenic bladder . Patients must significant preoperative voiding symptom define American Urologic Association symptom score great 19 . Patients must prior history radiation pelvis . Patients must persistent bacteriuria clear , demonstrate negative urinalysis urine culture , within 1 month surgery . Patients must allergies pig tissue pig product religious cultural objection use pig tissue .
